446470.name: New York Taxi Simulator
446470.description:
Start your career as a taxi driver in the city of New York and carry your customers safely and on time to their final destination. Good reliability and consistency will be rewarded. Deliver satisfied customers from pickup to setdown. Take special orders and extra trips to unlock additional vehicles and become the best driver in New York!

Features

  • 3 realistic taxis
  • Realistic Driving and cornering ability
  • A well animated and detailed city
  • Realistic simulated traffic
  • 6 different camera positions
  • 3 different mission modes with different bonus systems
446470.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
